tags.name: fhi-button
tags.description:
---


### **Events:**
 - **click** - Fired when the user clicks the button.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The content of the button, typically text or an icon.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--fhi-border-radius-full** - --dimension-border-radius - Controls the border radius of the button. _(default: undefined)_

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Defines the color of the button with the semantic values accent, neutral and danger. Default = accent.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the button, making it non-interactive.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of the button. When used in a form, 'submit' will submit the form, and 'reset' will reset it. Default is 'submit'.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: semantic values for the avaialable variants strong, subtle, outlined and text.
